title: The Ornamental projection, flower bed etc
clause_text: The Ornamental projection, flower bed etc. over a balcony or gallery, its projection not exceeding 0.75 m. from the balcony or gallery.
section: Other features permitted in open space:

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Ornamental projection, flower bed etc. over a balcony or gallery, its projection not exceeding 0.75 m. from the balcony or gallery.
